mapper.update: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ${tableName}; CREATE TABLE ${tableName} ( username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL , password VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL , nickname VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT NULL , phone VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL , email VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT NULL , created_time DATETIME NOT NULL, updated_time DATETIME NOT NULL, pic VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL, wxid VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, sex INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, created_by BIGINT(20) DEFAULT NULL, updated_by BIGINT(20) DEFAULT NULL, account_enable TINYINT(1) DEFAULT NULL , account_non_expired TINYINT(1) DEFAULT NULL , credential_non_expired TINYINT(1) DEFAULT NULL , account_non_lock TINYINT(1) DEFAULT NULL , dep_id INT(11) DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (username), UNIQUE KEY phone (phone) USING BTREE, UNIQUE KEY email (email) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
